showScoreExcerpt:
"A perfectly enjoyable, charm-infused pop musical that strives to encircle its hefty political subplot in good humor...Menken hasn’t tried to produce solo showstoppers, but rather ensemble songs...Slater’s lyrics tend to flatten out characterization...Zaks’ talent for delivering fast-paced, upbeat musicals has never been clearer...Palminteri’s social commentary is glancing, mild, and immediately followed up with laughs; it’s not an empty message, but it’s not particularly nuanced or deep."
